description: A vulnerability, which was classified as problematic, has been found in Portabilis i-Educar 2.9.0. Affected by this issue is some unknown functionality of the file intranet/educar_turma_tipo_det.php?cod_turma_tipo=ID of the component Turma Module. The manipulation of the argument nm_tipo leads to cross site scripting. The attack may be launched remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. The vendor was contacted early about this disclosure but did not respond in any way.
